About the Company: Swastika Investmart Ltd`s objective is to become a full service brokerage house and to provide comprehensive advisory services to their clients under one umbrella. The services offered by the company includes Stock broking  NSE & BSE  Equities & Derivatives.Commodities trading  NCDEX & MCX.Depository services  CDSL.Portfolio Management & Investment Advisory Services.Mutual Funds And Fixed Deposits Investments.Initial Public Offering ( IPO) and IPO financing.Technical Analysis and Research based advice.Internet Based Trading.
